wikipedia_page.main: David Davidson (born 20 August 1934) is a Scottish footballer, who played as a wing half in the Football League for Manchester City and Workington.

response: * David Davidson (footballer, born 1934), Scottish footballer (Manchester City, Workington AFC)
* David Davidson (Queen's Park footballer) (fl. 1878–1881), footballer for Queen's Park and Scotland
* David Davidson (Canadian politician) (1839–1909), lumberman and politician in Ontario, Canada
* David Davidson (film director) (born 1953), American film director
